title: Inviting a Friend to Do Something

content.text: In this lesson, you'll learn how to invite a friend to do something, like getting a coffee.
To ask a question in Dutch, the verb often comes first. For example, 'jij hebt' (you have) becomes 'heb jij...?' (do you have...?)

data.tip: The 'u' sound is short and sharp, similar to the 'u' in the English word 'put'.

content.text: Use 'Zullen we...?' to make a friendly suggestion to do something together.

data.phrase: Zullen we een keer koffie drinken?

content.title: Making an Invitation
content.setting: You see your friend Alex and want to invite them for a coffee.

conversation_flow.title: Suggest getting coffee sometime
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Nee, ik heb het niet druk. Hoezo?

conversation_flow.title: Ask which day works for them

content.text: Great! Now let's find a time and place that works.

data.tip: The 'oe' sounds like the 'oo' in 'food'. The 'g' at the end is a soft, throaty sound.

content.text: To say a time, use 'om ... uur', which means 'at ... o'clock'. For example, 'om drie uur'.

content.title: Setting a Time and Place
content.setting: You're continuing the conversation with Alex to decide on the details.

conversation_flow.title: Propose a day and time
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ik kan op woensdag of donderdag. Wat is goed voor jou?

extract_info.day: Extract the day of the week from the user's message

conversation_flow.title: Agree to the new time
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: {day} om drie uur kan ik niet. Kan je om vier uur?

extract_info.final_day: Set the final day based on the previous turn's day
extract_info.final_time: Set the final time to 'vier uur'

extract_info.place: Extract the location from the user's message

content.text: Almost done! Let's confirm the plan and say goodbye.
The expression 'Ik heb er zin in' is a very common way to say you're excited about something that is going to happen.

data.tip: The 'i' is short, like in the English word 'sin'.

content.title: Confirming the Plan
content.setting: You are finalizing the coffee plans with Alex.

conversation_flow.title: Say you're looking forward to it
